getColor(RayHit) - Method in class utilities.Light
The getColor method gets the color of the shape that the RayHit object has hit and multiplies the lights intensity with its color so that the object looks brighter.

getPixelColor(int, int, int, int) - Method in class renderer.Renderer
The getPixelColor method is the method that is used to convert the Image pixels to screen pixels and passes them to the createRay method to get a Ray that goes through the pixel.

getReflection() - Method in class geometries.Shape
